definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
and so on/in a similar fashion

sentences.english: But i heard you are the best.
sentences.chinese: 在某個領域裏最優秀，卻又不以此自矜。

sentences.english: He started another matter to enrage me, but I didn't care.
sentences.chinese: 他又提出另一問題，想以此激怒我，可我並沒在意。

sentences.english: Polar bears depend on solid sea ice for survival; it's where they do their hunting.
sentences.chinese: 北極熊在厚厚的海洋冰層上獵食，以此爲生。

sentences.english: I entertained myself flicking wheat-based projectiles at the cat.
sentences.chinese: 我把小麪糰當成子彈彈向那隻貓，以此來打發時間。

sentences.english: To my friends who need strength.
sentences.chinese: 瑾以此獻給所有需要力量的朋友們。

sentences.english: Specifically see the injustice all the way, good to play the powerful Han, as the city is people are afraid of him Jiangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 專一路見不平，好打強漢，以此江州滿城人都怕他。

sentences.english: 4，We're willing to make you a firm offer at this price.
sentences.chinese: 我們願意以此價格爲你報實盤。

sentences.english: This pressure will be the basis for well shut in and killing in case blowing out.
sentences.chinese: 今後井噴以此壓力爲關井和壓井的依據。

sentences.english: Listen to your heart for guidance.
sentences.chinese: 聽從你的內心，以此爲指引。

sentences.english: Their issuance is meant to limit lending in the same way an interest-rate increase might do.
sentences.chinese: 政府希望以此在抑制貸款方面產生與加息相同的效果。

sentences.english: XuanZu pretends to zen to light the sea king, to test the courtiers faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 宣祖假裝要禪位給光海君，以此試探臣子們的忠心。

sentences.english: Under-16s would usually need a prescription to prevent a possible pregnancy in this way.
sentences.chinese: 16歲以下的少女通常需要藥方，纔可以以此避孕。

sentences.english: We’re willing to make you a firm offer at this price.
sentences.chinese: 我們願意以此價格爲你報實盤。

sentences.english: Ann: Honestly, there are so many beggars who are pretended to cheat the passerby.
sentences.chinese: 老實說，很多乞丐都是假裝的，以此來騙路人的錢。

definition: so as to/for the purpose of/in order to
in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

in addition/moreover/(used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
so that/so as to/in order to
in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
